section.title: Interface to D-Bus
section.para: This is an &ffi-pac;-based interface to the &d-bus-link; message bus system, a simple way for applications to talk to one another.
The package DBUS is &case-sensitive-k;, e.g., you would write (dbus:dbus_error_init ...) when you need to call the &c-lang; function dbus_error_init.
section.simpara: When this module is present, &features-my; contains the symbol :D-BUS.
section.para: All public &c-lang; functions are available as &foreign-function-t;s, defined in modules/dbus/dbus.lisp.
